# cmccloudv2_waf_cert (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create a certificate, two files `waf_cert.cer` & `waf_cert.key` are stored in the current directory
resource "cmccloudv2_waf_cert" "cert1" {
    name        = "cert1"
    cert_name   = "waf_cert.cer"
    cert_data   = file("waf_cert.cer")
    key_name    = "waf_cert.key"
    key_data    = file("waf_cert.key")
    description = "cert for waf"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cert_data` (String, Sensitive) Certificate data, generate example from https://en.rakko.tools/tools/46/
- `cert_name` (String) The name of the certificate
- `key_data` (String, Sensitive) Private key, generate example from https://en.rakko.tools/tools/46/
- `key_name` (String) The name of the private key
- `name` (String) The name of the WAF certificate

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the WAF certificate
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The created time of the WAF certificate
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
